line_1: Modestly bold, and quick to apprehend,
line_2: Prompt in Replies, but cautious to offend.

line_1: For now the Wormwood Dam'sels apprehend
line_2: The dismal Consequence of such a Friend:

line_1: My heart beats again; I again apprehend
line_2: Some fortunate rival in every friend.

line_1: Unequal Thought; whilst All We apprehend,
line_2: Is, that our Hopes must rise, our Sorrows end;

line_1: Unequal Thought; whilst All We apprehend,
line_2: As our Creator deigns to be our Friend.

line_1: We question not, but cannot apprehend
line_2: God, who created it, can make it end,
